content:
✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: it's really interesting contribution

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: la contribution est cool et a un niveau de difficulté adéquat, les tests fonctionnent correctement donc ça me parait bon !

✅ Approved the contribution.
Comment: Le problème est bien adapté pour un CoC rapide comme pour un CoC taille de code
I like the puzzle because the instruction is very clear
I like this puzzle for the speed category! great idea !

I'm not sure if the statement was changed since the last 2 comments, but I just wrote a solution in Java and it worked fine. 

As a note, the "Solution Language" field is there to show what language the author's solution is in. It doesn't force a specific language (I don't think it's possible for the community to language-lock a puzzle, the only one I've seen is the Nintendo sponsored one).

I think this would work out pretty well for a reverse clash, just add a testcase where all the characters are lowercase and have a sum of 0.

Notes:
- Remove the "Python", because you cannot force people to use python. 
- Change the [[length s]] to length of [[s]].
- Add the line number in input and output, such as: <<Line 1>>: A string [[s]]

1. Please follow the presentation in the example for the Input and Output sections:
https://www.codingame.com/playgrounds/40701/help-center/statement#guidelines

2. You cannot require others to use Python to write their code. They can choose other programming languages too.

3. length of [[s]] instead of [[length s]].
The puzzle is ready to approve or reject please share your onion if you really liked it.
The puzzle is ready to approve or reject please share your onion if you really liked it.
